Set Your Weight Profile Move the seekbars to set the weight you want on each objective. 
The buttons at the bottom of your screen are predefined weight profiles that you can use. Weight on time Weight on money. Weight on energy Confirm Money Saver Emergency Low Power Reset
Search An Exam Record MOCCAD Results of your search Enter a number Enter a name Enter a description Enter a date Enter a time Search
Sort By Record List Show costs This response costs you:
Details ID: Patient Name: Patient First Name: Patient Last Name: Doctor Name: Doctor First Name: Doctor Last Name: Description: Date: Time: Heart Rate:
Welcome to the MOCCAD Prototype Application ! 


This application allows you to search for information respecting your constraints / needs. 

You will firstly need to set / choose a weight profile. Then, enter the information you want to search. 
Click the search button and results will be displayed. 


Our system ensures the costs are the best, regarding your weight profile. Get Started !
